title: Mobuyama A-ji to Mobutani C-rou no Karei naru Nichijou e no Chousen
original_name: モブ山 A 治とモブ谷 C 郎の華麗なる日常への挑戦
sinopse:
1. Mobuyama A-ji to Mobutani C-rou no Karei naru Nichijou e no Chousen
2. Ayanokouji Erika no Karei naru BL Mangaka e no Fukkatsu
3. Kiniro, Sorairo, Namida-iro.
   4-5. Minasoko ni Sumu Kodomotachi
4. Takano Miki kara Karei naru Hyoudaisaku Shutsuensha-tachi e no Kujou
